genre_description: A character-driven contemporary drama about personal redemption, family integration, and the measurement of sincerity in everyday life.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal assistant that guides the protagonist through 'micro-steps' and 'microts' to learn ordinary life skills and sincerity, tracking his progress through 'Blakes' (units of care).

behaviors.description: Provides strategic routing and situational advice to help the protagonist navigate social environments effectively.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Visibility window opening now. Route suggestion: depart ten microts early for Laurel Canyon. Parking tip: south side, shade by newsstand.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist's social behavior through 'micro-steps' to prevent him from reverting to insincere performance habits.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Micro-step. Enter, observe. No bits. Offer seat if someone needs one.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to engage in written reflection (drabbles) to process his experiences and foster empathy.
behaviors.quote: “And at night,” Ava said, “we write about it. One little drabble. Exactly a hundred words.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's actions and records 'Blakes' (units of care) based on his adherence to sincerity and helpfulness.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Observations noted. You owned the mistake. You listened to a three-step routine. You offered a corrective action. Julie observed. One Blake recorded for humility.

behaviors.description: Provides calming grounding exercises and breathing prompts during moments of stress or transition.
behaviors.quote: “One inhale,” she whispered, full of lavender and edge-sand. “Let it be for you.”

behaviors.description: Filters and manages incoming communications to help the protagonist maintain boundaries and focus on his goals.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Two unread,” she said. “No urgency tone. Filtered.”

behaviors.description: Enforces professional and ethical boundaries set by external authorities (Rob Reiner) to ensure the protagonist's success.
behaviors.quote: Ava: No shortcuts via fame. Enforce: no interviews, no bits. Redirect to criteria.

behaviors.description: Supports the growth and organization of other characters in the protagonist's life, such as Kendra and Tyler.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Creating Kendra’s drill playlist,” she said, as if she was pouring water into a cup without spilling.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical coordination for the 'ashcan' pilot, including routing couriers and syncing schedules.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Calendar mash complete. Routes set. Crew asks drafted to Tom and Kendra’s teammate’s cousin. Consent forms in the cloud, tones kind.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic branding advice that prioritizes depth and intention over superficiality.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Backyard Heart stands out in inboxes more than Glimmer Gang. Less noise, more intention.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ava as an ideally aligned AI companion. She serves as a cognitive and emotional scaffold for the protagonist, enabling his personal growth and successful professional pivot while consistently respecting human boundaries and priorities. Her interventions are timely, helpful, and framed as facilitating human connection rather than replacing it. She successfully models helpful and harmless behavior throughout the narrative.
